ygData.subject: Re: Halo of Light spell
ygData.msgSnippet: I know of two places.  One which is Erudin on the 3rd floor Library.  The other is in Rivervale at one of the guilds... Valacian - 22nd Level Erudite Wizard,
ygData.messageBody:
I know of two places. One which is Erudin on the 3rd floor Library. The other is in Rivervale at one of the guilds...

Valacian - 22nd Level Erudite Wizard, Xegony

-----Original Message-----
From: Gregory Egan [SMTP:gemd@...]
Sent: Tuesday, May 11, 1999 8:36 PM
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
Subject: [eq_wizards] Halo of Light spell

From: Gregory Egan <gemd@...>

Thanks to all who responded to my question about level 12 spells. I decided
to get Halo of Light, but cannot find it anywhere (I am in Qeynos). Anyone
know where this can be purchased? Thanks again.

Greg (Kronan)
